channel.title: The Wildy V2 IRON MAN, DEDI, OSRS, ECO, ZULRAH, SOCIAL SLAYER
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XM8kvo3.png[/img]
[url=http://thewildy.com/showthread.php?tid=9][img]http://i.imgur.com/H0sJnha.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LFH2Tg3.png[/img]
[b] Us here at The Wildy want to provide a high quality OSRS experience with a private server twist. We want players to experience a challenging but rewarding experience playing The Wildy. Instead we provide many options to achieve those goals easily. We are a 100% economy based server but you will have the option to choose between different exp modes. [/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JzLj8Sa.png[/img] [b]Our economy is set up to reward every player despite what game mode they prefer (PvP, PvM, Skilling). There are many markets for you to exploit and succeed here in The Wildy.[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gtkD76r.png[/img][b] Full Barrows Social Slayer Quick prayers Full Pest Control Godwars Custom Minigames Hunter All Skills Full Bank Tabs with searching Iron Man Mode Switchable Exp Modes Emblems OSRS Wilderness Bosses OSRS Weapons Correct weapon specials and attacks Full Clan Chat Achievements[/b] [b]100% dwarf cannon[/b] [b]Multiple bosses[/b] [b]Zulrah[/b] [b]Toxic Blow Pipe[/b] [b]Weekly events[/b] [b]Superb combat && Much more.... [/b] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/18ce665231234bff4125f56df5752575.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3d27d38cc9e394c467ac8a09bc4e6e3b.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1f1f6b959a32f1c0839c949a173bb581.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/2a11f033129d4fb1529bd0a1823b0cc9.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/66338f015d28fe6ac1ec187cb097488e.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/9c4fddd76dd6ba00c57ce5bef76073b2.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/29b74cf4202f21a2306ecbf196ec2edb.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KQBuos7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/alFpyYY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tuPWpwG.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: The Wildy V2 IRON MAN, DEDI, OSRS, ECO, ZULRAH, SOCIAL SLAYER
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

There are ALOT of OSRS servers being made at this current time, nothing I see here is much different from the other ones (Other than the dwarf multicannon functioning, that is pretty nice).

Maybe add some of your own concepts and ideas to your OSRS remake so you essentially have something a bit more unique. Goodluck with this.

Read full topic

item.title: The Wildy V2 IRON MAN, DEDI, OSRS, ECO, ZULRAH, SOCIAL SLAYER
item.dc:creator: @mmshadow808 mmshadow808
item.description:
@mmshadow808 wrote:

[center]


Us here at The Wildy want to provide a high quality OSRS experience with a private server twist. We want players to experience a challenging but rewarding experience playing The Wildy. Instead we provide many options to achieve those goals easily. We are a 100% economy based server but you will have the option to choose between different exp modes.


Our economy is set up to reward every player despite what game mode they prefer (PvP, PvM, Skilling). There are many markets for you to exploit and succeed here in The Wildy.


Full Barrows
Social Slayer
Quick prayers
Full Pest Control
Godwars
Custom Minigames
Hunter
All Skills
Full Bank Tabs with searching
Iron Man Mode
Switchable Exp Modes
Emblems
OSRS Wilderness Bosses
OSRS Weapons
Correct weapon specials and attacks
Full Clan Chat
Achievements
100% dwarf cannon
Multiple bosses
Zulrah
Toxic Blow Pipe
Weekly events
Superb combat
&&
Much more…










[/center]

Read full topic
